welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Anselmo, a charming town known for its quaint shops and beautiful hiking trails. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope your stay with us is filled with unforgettable experiences."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Napa County Airport provides services for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Napa County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buchanan Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
